title: Borneo Oceanfront Island Paradise with Daily Breakfast, Daily Three-Course Lunch or Dinner & Cocktails
description:
Let the soothing crash of waves transport you to a tranquil escape at this hidden gem off the coast of Borneo. Set along the crescent-shaped shores of Malohom Bay on Gaya Island, this peaceful resort within the protected Tunku Abdul Rahman National Park seamlessly combines luxury with a commitment to ecological preservation.

Discover the wonders of the onsite Marine Ecology Research Centre, where you can learn about giant clam restocking and reef regeneration initiatives. Dine at Macac Restaurant, soaking in breathtaking beach views, or unwind with a tropical cocktail at Latitude Bar at sunset. For complete relaxation, treat yourself to a revitalizing experience at Echo Wellness Spa, a serene haven perched by the ocean’s edge.
offer_address: Malohom Bay Pulau Gaya, Kota Kinabalu 88000, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Borneo Beachfront Golf Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Roundtrip Airport Transfers
description:
Retreat to The Magellan Sutera Resort, a luxurious beachfront gem nestled beside the sparkling waters of the South China Sea on Malaysia's Borneo island. Part of the Sutera Harbour Resort complex, this tropical escape sits on 384 acres of lush greenery punctuated by lagoon-style pools, a stunning golf course and a dazzlingly huge array of restaurants and bars. From the architectural majesty of the lobby to impressive views of the sea, the resort offers leisure and adventure in one gorgeous location. Spend afternoons relaxing on the beach sipping cocktails by one of the resort's four mirage-like pools, or strike out to onsite Sutera Harbour Marina, Golf and Country Club to take a swing at the extraordinary 27-hole Graham Marsh-designed championship golf course.

Located just around the corner from Kota Kinabalu city centre, The Magellan Sutera Resort allows you to experience the best of Borneo's Sabah region. While the city's vast dining and shopping options are just a short drive away, there's plenty on the grounds of the resort to occupy travellers of all types. Whether you're looking for unforgettable experiences or complete relaxation, the barefoot sophistication of this high-end resort will fulfil your every need.
offer_address: 1 Sutera Harbour Boulevard, Sutera Harbour, Kota Kinabalu 88100, Malaysia

title: Award-Winning Borneo Beachfront Paradise with Daily Breakfast, Two Dinners & Return Airport Transfers
description:
Step into an exclusive sanctuary tucked within Malaysia’s tropical Borneo with this glamorous Shangri-La stay. An untouched oasis set among 400 acres of beachfront rainforest, this is the perfect escape from city life, complete with a sprawling three-kilometre stretch of private golden sands.

Spend your days relaxing by one of two shimmering pools, practicing your swing at the resort's 18-hole championship golf course, cutting through the waves on a jet-ski or exploring the lush rainforest reserve on guided rainforest walks.

When it's time to refuel, head to one of the onsite eateries - enjoying mouthwatering Chinese fare at The Eighth, Southeast Asian specialities at Tepi Laut and Japanese favourites at Kozan Teppan-yaki. For moments of total disconnection, escape to the quiet serenity of The Spa.
offer_address: Pantai Dalit, Tuaran, Kota Kinabalu, Sabah 89208, Malaysia

title: Hilton Luxury in Malaysian Borneo with Club Lounge Access
description:
Experience a spectacular Hilton stay in the tropical city of Kota Kinabalu, located on the coast of Sabah, Malaysian Borneo. Framed by rainforest and beaches, this historic destination offers the perfect combination of city life and nature. Includes daily buffet breakfast, access to the hotel’s exclusive Executive Lounge - with the option of continental breakfast in the lounge, afternoon snacks and evening drinks - one cocktail per adult, convenient return airport transfers and discounts on poolside massages, food and drinks.

**Travelling with family?** One child (aged 11 years and under) stays free of charge. See Fine Print for details.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Jalan Tunku Abdul Rahman, Asia City, 88000 Kota Kinabalu, Sabah, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Borneo Luxury in Sabah with Guaranteed Ocean-Views & Daily Breakfast
description: Escape to a luxurious haven in the heart of Malaysia's Kota Kinabalu and immerse yourself in the splendour of opulent living at the five-star Pacific Sutera Hotel. This top-tier hotel, just steps from the sparkling marina, offers guests access to many of the city's best attractions, including the vibrant Sabah State Mosque and bustling Gaya Street markets. Sit overlooking the ocean with a cocktail at hand at Breeze Beach Club, embark on a sunset cruise from the adjacent Sutera Harbour, or enjoy a hit of golf at the nearby club. For a moment of indulgence, retreat to one of the six on-site restaurants, offering a tantalising fusion of East meets West as you bask in panoramic views of the stunning sea.
offer_address: 1 Sutera Harbour Boulevard, Sutera Harbour, 88100, Kota Kinabalu Sabah, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Beachfront Borneo with Incredible Dining, Beverage and Spa Inclusions
description: Explore the tropical beauty of Borneo, Malaysia, at The Magellan Sutera Resort - part of a five-star beachfront complex with a golf course, five restaurants and lounges, a spa and more. With incredible inclusions such as return airport transfers, daily buffet breakfasts, nightly drinks, a Javanese dining experience, three 25-minute massages each, unlimited access to the resort’s facilities including tennis courts, squash courts and much more.

title: Five-Star Borneo Shangri-La Beachfront Paradise with Daily Breakfast, Airport Transfer & Seaview Room Upgrade
description:
Experience a five-star escape in Malaysia’s tropical Borneo at the spectacular Shangri-La Rasa Ria, Kota Kinabalu. An oasis set among 400 acres of beachfront rainforest, the resort is the perfect escape from city life, complete with a three-kilometre stretch of private beach where you can unwind and soak up the sun. Spend your days relaxing by the glistening swimming pool, working up a sweat in the fitness centre or belting out your favourite tunes at the Dalit Karaoke lounge. Then, practice your swing at the 18-hole championship golf course or enjoy a rejuvenating treatment at the onsite spa.

When you’re not relaxing on the sand, wander along the nearby hiking trails leading you through the 64-acre forest reserve. Then, refuel at one of the onsite eateries, enjoying mouthwatering Chinese fare at The Eighth, Southeast Asian specialities at Tepi Laut and Japanese favourites at Kozan Teppan-yaki.

title: Borneo Five-Star Beachfront Retreat with Room Upgrade, Club Lounge Access & Daily Breakfast
description:
A luxurious beachfront gem nestled beside the sparkling waters of the South China Sea, The Magellan Sutera Resort - Sutera Harbour Resort is one of the most impressive retreats on Malaysia's Borneo island. Part of the Sutera Harbour Resort complex, this tropical escape sits on 384 acres of lush greenery punctuated by lagoon-style pools, elegant accommodation, a huge array of restaurants and bars, and a stunning golf course. From the architectural majesty of the longhouse-style lobby to the impressive views of the sea, the resort offers leisure and adventure in one gorgeous location.

Located just around the corner from Kota Kinabalu city centre, The Magellan Sutera Resort - Sutera Harbour Resort allows you to experience the best of Borneo's Sabah region. While the city's vast dining and shopping options are just a short drive away, there's plenty on the grounds of the resort to occupy travellers of all types. Take part in energetic activities like bowling, squash or table tennis, or spend the day relaxing on the beach and sipping cocktails by one of the resort's four pools. A trip to Sutera Harbour Marina, Golf and Country Club is a must, if only to see the 27-hole Graham Marsh-designed championship golf course. Whether you're looking for unforgettable experiences or complete relaxation, the barefoot sophistication of this high-end resort will fulfil your every need.
offer_address: 1 Sutera Harbour Boulevard, Sutera Harbour, Kota Kinabalu Sabah 88100 Malaysia

description: With its exclusive beachfront in the glistening marina, its lagoon-style pools surrounded by immaculate palms and views over the South China Sea and nearby tropical islands, The Magellan Sutera Resort is one of Malaysian Borneo’s most impressive retreats. Take part in energetic activities such as unlimited bowling, tennis, a driving range and complimentary movies in abundance at this high-end resort oozing exclusivity and barefoot sophistication. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, a daily glass of wine or beer each, a dim sum lunch, return airport transfers and more.

title: Sophisticated Borneo Escape in Kota Kinabalu with Rooftop Restaurant & Infinity Pool
description:
Revel in the laidback coastal charms of Borneo's Kota Kinabalu from this elegant retreat, perfectly positioned in the heart of Sabah's capital. The sleek hotel serves up stunning views of the South China Sea and is a short stroll from the bustling Gaya Street Market, featuring a fascinating display of local produce, crafts, souvenirs and delicious tidbits.

Savour international flavours at the hotel's Maupassant restaurant, grab a cuppa from the trendy Phileas Cafe and sip on well-crafted cocktails by the rooftop infinity pool. For a taste of local culture, the Sabah State Museum and the waterfront Kota Kinabalu City Mosque await exploration.
offer_address: Jalan Gaya 41, Kota Kinabal 88000, Malaysia

vendor_name: Shangri-La's Tanjung Aru Resort and Spa
title: Borneo Waterfront Shangri-La Resort with Private Island Sunset Bar
description:
Dreams of a secluded paradise are realised at Shangri-La Tanjung Aru, Kota Kinabalu, a five-star tropical oasis on the coast of Borneo. Lose yourself in fabulous facilities, including six bars and restaurants - one of which, Sunset Bar, is nestled on a private island out at sea, and is the best spot in Borneo for epic sunsets and cocktails. Head to the indulgent Chi, The Spa for pampering treatments or make use of the palm-fringed swimming pool and state-of-the-art fitness centre. 

Little ones are kept entertained with a fun-filled Kids' Club and water play area. For more splashy fun, head out to the resort's exclusively owned and operated STAR Marina, home to watersport services and a dive learning centre. This is also your gateway to the neighbouring islands: enjoy a day trip by boat to explore islands of soft white sand and azure waters.
offer_address: No 20 Jalan Aru, Kota Kinabalu 88100, Malaysia

title: Borneo Shangri-La Beachfront Oasis with 18-Hole Championship Golf Course

title: Waterfront Central Kota Kinabalu Escape with Three Restaurants, Outdoor Pool & Spa
description:
Experience the vibrant energy of Borneo's capital city with a stay at Hyatt Regency Kinabalu. This five-star waterfront oasis is ideally situated in the heart of Kota Kinabalu, offering easy access to the city's bustling markets, historic landmarks and nearby islands.

Savour local delicacies at the hotel's Tanjung Ria Kitchen or sip on refreshing cocktails at Poolside Bar. For a dose of culture, the Sabah State Museum and the revered Kota Kinabalu City Mosque are a short drive away or explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Kinabalu National Park.
offer_address: 88991, Jalan Datuk Salleh Sulong, Kota Kinabalu, Sabah 88804, Malaysia

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Kota Kinabalu City Centre
title: Kota Kinabalu Escape with Onsite Cafe
description: Experience the best of city and sand from your central location at Holiday Inn Express Kota Kinabalu City Centre, an IHG Hotel. Located in Malaysian Borneo, shouldered by rainforest and glistening beaches, Kota Kinabalu has endless natural vistas to explore. Visit the local night market or explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Kinabalu National Park. After a busy day, enjoy a quiet cup of coffee or whet your appetite with Asian and Western-inspired plates at onsite cafe SignalHill Coffee.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Kota Kinabalu City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.1, Jalan Tunku Abdul Rahman, Kota Kinabalu 88000, Malaysia

title: Malaysia Kota Kinabalu Hyatt Escape with Infinity Pool & Rooftop Bar
description:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant energy of Kota Kinabalu with this five-star Hyatt stay. Just a short stroll from the lively Gaya Street and the scenic waterfront promenade, this contemporary hideaway is the perfect base for exploring Sabah’s rich culture and natural beauty.

After a day of adventure, unwind with locally inspired cuisine at ON22 Restaurant, where fresh, regional ingredients take centre stage in flavourful Asian dishes. Then, ascend to ON23 Sky Bar for delicious cocktails and gourmet nibbles, set against a backdrop of lush hills and ocean sunsets.
offer_address: 18 Jalan Haji Saman, Kota Kinabalu, Sabah 88000, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Malaysia Borneo Oceanfront Paradise with Overwater Villas
description: Let the sounds of waves crashing lull you into a state of holiday dreaming at Gayana Marine Resort, a five-star hideaway resting on the crescent shores of Malohom Bay off the coast of Sabah. Spend days dining at Macac Restaurant, boasting exceptional ocean views, or enjoy a tropical cocktail at Latitude Bar at sunset. When you're in need of some RnR, book a pampering treatment at Echo Wellness Spa, a tranquil space perched at the ocean's edge.
